fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Light Punch: Visit a player. Gain 1 Combo if you're the only visitor. Attack them if you have 3+ Combo.
- [__BUNT__]: Requires 1 Combo. Visit a player and guess who they're visiting tonight. If correct, you gain 1 Combo and remove the Baseball from the house (if they have it), and hold the Baseball. If you are correct on a house that does not have the Baseball, you gain 2 Combo instead.
- [__PITCH__]: Spend [1] Combo. If you are holding the Baseball, throw it at any player. Astrally powerfully rampage at their house and lose the Baseball. Gain 1 Combo for each player killed, up to a max of 3.
- [__SWING__]: Spend [1] Combo. Attack a player and choose a second target. If the Baseball is at the first target's house, remove it and hold the Baseball. Then, throw the baseball at the second target, dealing an astral basic attack to them (skipping dead players and yourself). Gain 1 combo for each player killed.

fields.name: Abilities (cont.):
fields.value: - Overdrive (__HOME RUN __): Requires 5 Combo. Deal an Overkill attack to anyone. If you are holding the Baseball, choose two targets instead.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, a Baseball appears at someone's house. Only you and the other fighter know where it is. It won't ever be at the house of the other fighter.
- At the end of each day, if the Baseball is on a dead player's house, it moves to a random house.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill the other Fighter, then be the last one standing.
